name: Fire And Electric Wand
description:
This is a third-party add-on for the Mana Seed Character Base asset. It functions like a paper doll layer, so you must own the Character Base in order to use this.

This pack includes:

  • Wand animations for the sword and shield pages 1, 2 and 3 of the character base listed above.
  • Both fire and electric attack animations.
  • A fire and electric projectile. (both 4 frames)

I welcome any suggestions or feedback for this addon, particularly for new spells that you would like to see included at no additional cost. Please leave your feedback in the comments section. While I cannot promise to implement every idea, I will consider all suggestions.
